mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT spermission.* FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role srole ON srole.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = srole.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission spermission ON rp.permission_id = spermission.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY u.id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.id
